metadata.title: CVE-2012-4391 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in core/ajax/appconfig.phpin ownCloud before 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to hijack theauthentication of administrators for requests that edit the appconfigurations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
